DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effect vortioxetine cognitive dysfunction major depressive disorder ( MDD ) patient inadequate response current antidepressant treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Vortioxetine Versus Escitalopram Cognitive Function Patients With Inadequate Response Current Antidepressant Treatment Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: The patient MDD , diagnose accord DSMIVTR™ recurrent MDE ( classification 296.3x ) confirm use Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient depressive symptom currently consider non partially responsive ( inadequate response ) , one adequate course SSRI/SNRI antidepressant monotherapy candidate switch investigator 's opinion . The patient want stop take his/her current SSRI/SNRI treatment due inadequate response confirm Antidepressant Treatment Response Questionnaire ( ATRQ ) , < 50 % response current treatment ) . The patient must treat SSRI/SNRI monotherapy ( citalopram , paroxetine , sertraline , duloxetine , venlafaxine ) least 6 week license dos prior Screening Visit . The patient PHQ9 total score ≥14 . The patient MADRS total score ≥ 22 . The patient current MDE ≤1 year . The patient Perceived Deficits Questionnaire Depression ( PDQD ) total score > 25 . The patient man woman age ≥18 ≤65 year . The patient score ≥70 DSST ( Number Correct Symbols ) Baseline Visit . The patient physical , cognitive , language impairment severity adversely affect validity data derive neuropsychological test . The patient current psychiatric disorder Axis I disorder ( accord DSMIVTR™ criterion ) MDD , assess use MINI . The patient current diagnosis dysthymic disorder within 3 month precede onset current episode ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient borderline , schizotypal , schizoid , paranoid , histrionic , antisocial personality disorder ( axis II ) comorbid primary diagnosis ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient history previous MDEs consider treatment resistant define inadequate response ( incomplete therapeutic response ) two prior course least 6 week conventional antidepressant drug adequate dosage , patient treatmentresistant depression investigator 's judgement . The patient suffers personality disorder , mental retardation , pervasive development disorder , attentiondeficit/hyperactivity disorder , organic mental disorder , mental disorder due general medical condition ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . The patient diagnosis alcohol substance abuse dependence ( exclude nicotine caffeine ) ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) sustain full remission least 2 year prior Screening Visit . The patient current diagnosis history manic hypomanic episode , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , include major depression psychotic feature ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) . Other protocol define inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
